title: (x) Beck "Guero"/Koat Mentarvais - Polonaise/Voluta Script {Paul H/Yves}
content:
Who know’s these script fonts?

Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [beck\_guero.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080121024846/http:/typophile.com/files/beck_guero.jpg) | 17.47 KB |
| [250x200Article\_Koat.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080121024846/http:/typophile.com/files/250x200Article_Koat.jpg) | 27.18 KB |

 [‹ (x) Looking for font similar to "Aqua di Parma label - various {gang}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080121024846/http:/typophile.com/node/15709 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Samoan Wedding - Dalliance {Dav} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080121024846/http:/typophile.com/node/15707 "Go to next forum topic")
author: fogfish

comments.content: The second one is [Viktor Solt-Bittner](http://web.archive.org/web/20080121024846/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Viktor%252BSolt-Bittner)’s popular — and very well done — [Voluta Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20080121024846/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontdetail&displayfontid=LH.117584.0.1&attributes.sampleSize=48&sampleText=Koat+Mentarvais&sampleSize=60).

I don’t know what the first one is, but make sure to check out [Eduardo Recife](http://web.archive.org/web/20080121024846/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Eduardo%252BRecife)’s gorgeous grunge scripts Porcelain, Selfish, Mosh and Nars on [Misprinted type](http://web.archive.org/web/20080121024846/http:/www.misprintedtype.com/v3/fonts.php).

yves! you’re sleepin on the job! we ID’d the Beck Guero font as [Polonaise](http://web.archive.org/web/20080121024846/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/polonaise/) in [another thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20080121024846/http:/www.typophile.com/node/15379) recently.

Yves! You’re sleepin on the job!

Yup. Writing Bald Condensed till 02 am tends to do that to you... I’m surprised I managed to identify Voluta Script correctly. ;^)

_Writing Bald Condensed till 02 am tends to do that to you…_

nice. i’ll stop by and see if i can read it. thanks for all the hard work! :^D
It’ll be up after the weekend.
